textBeforeTable: Rank table Edit Lethality is a 10 point Rogue talent located in the 3rd tier of the Assassination Tree. It increases the damage of critcal strikes for most subtlety attacks. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ghostly Strike, Mutilate, Shiv, and Hemorrhage abilities by X%. [show] Contents None Talent required Yes Spec specific 10 Points required Requirements 5 Ranks Critical strike damage bonus Affects Assassination, Tier 3 Location Properties Rogue Class
textAfterTable: NotesEdit Mainly useful for lucky burst damage in pvp, not sustained boss dps. Provides 15% more damage to critical hits on your combo point generators. The average percent damage bonus on these attacks is given by: 100 * 0.3 * critrate / (.94 + critrate) Typical Backstab damage bonus: ~11.7% with Improved Backstab Typical Sinister Strike bonus: ~6.3% Compare to Opportunity: 20% Backstab bonus Compare to Surprise Attacks: 10% Backstab/Sinister Strike bonus (only costs 1 point) Compare to Relentless Strikes: ~6% Backstab/Sinister Strike bonus (only costs 1 point) Patch changesEdit Patch 1.4.0 (2005-05-05): Lethality no longer affects Ambush.
